overview_of_class: This course introduces students to the systematic study of American government and politics. Throughout the course we will focus on insights that can be gained by viewing the political process as a collective action problem. Students will be introduced to the basic institutions and actors in American government, and will examine the logic behind how our political system operates.
name: American Government and Politics
class_attributes:
Social & Behavioral Sciences Distro Area

Registration for discussion section required
subject: POLI_SCI
